extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

      private java.util.ArrayList<EnemyAction> allActions

    • Field Detail

      • defaultName

        public static java.lang.String defaultName
        Stores the default name for enemies.

        Set to "enemy".

      • defaultDescription

        public static java.lang.String defaultDescription
        Stores the default description for enemies.

        Set to "An enemy".

      • defaultHp

        public static int defaultHp
        Stores the default health for enemies.

        Set to 50.

      • defaultMaxhp

        public static int defaultMaxhp
        Stores the default max health for enemies.

        Set to 50.

      • defaultStrength

        public static int defaultStrength
        Stores the default strength for enemies.

        Set to 5.

      • defaultLevelRequirement

        public static int defaultLevelRequirement
        Stores the default level requirement for enemies.

        Set to 1.

      • defaultTurnsWithInvincibiltyLeft

        public static int defaultTurnsWithInvincibiltyLeft
        Stores the default turns with invincibility left for enemies.

        Set to 0.

      • name

        private java.lang.String name
        Stores the name of this enemy.

        Set to defaultName.

      • description

        private java.lang.String description
        Stores the description of this enemy.

        Set to defaultDescription.

      • maxhp

        private int maxhp
        Stores the max health of this enemy.

        Set to defaultMaxhp.

      • hp

        private int hp
        Stores the health of this enemy.

        Set to defaultHp.

      • strength

        private int strength
        Stores the strength of this enemy.

        Set to defaultStrength.

      • difficulty

        private int difficulty
        Stores the difficulty of this enemy.

        Difficulty is determined with: Math.round(hp * strength * levelRequirement / 100)

      • turnsWithInvincibilityLeft

        private int turnsWithInvincibilityLeft
        Stores the turns left with invincibility of this enemy.

        Set to defaultTurnsWithInvincibiltyLeft.

      • levelRequirement

        private int levelRequirement
        Stores the level required to fight this enemy.

        Set to defaultLevelRequirement.

      • requirements

        private java.util.ArrayList<Requirement> requirements
        Stores the requirements to fight this enemy.

        Set to an empty ArrayList of Requirements.

      • allActions

        private java.util.ArrayList<EnemyAction> allActions
        Stores all actions of this enemy.

        Set to an empty ArrayList of EnemyActions.

      • possibleActions

        private java.util.ArrayList<EnemyAction> possibleActions
        Stores actions of this enemy that meet their own requirements.

        Set to an empty ArrayList of EnemyActions.

        private java.util.ArrayList<TFMethod> allPremethods

        Set to an empty ArrayList of TFMethods.

        Set to an empty ArrayList of TFMethods.

    • Method Detail

      • getCustomVariables

        public java.util.ArrayList<CustomVariable> getCustomVariables​()
        Returns the customVariables.
        Returns:
        customVariables

      • getCustomVariableFromName

        public java.lang.Object getCustomVariableFromName​(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the value of the custom variable in customVariables with the name given.

        If name is null, or no variable with that name is found, return null.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the custom variable.
        Returns:
        The value of the customvariable with the name given. If no name given or one not found, return null.

      • setCustomVariableByName

        public void setCustomVariableByName​(java.lang.String name,
                                    java.lang.Object value)
        Sets the value of the variable in customVariables with the name given.

        If no name given, then dont do anything.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the custom variable.
        value - The value that the custom variable will be set to.

      • getSimpleOutput

        public java.lang.String getSimpleOutput​()
        Returns the output of the basic values.

        Returns name, description, difficulty, and if the enemy is a finalBoss, then append " !FINALBOSS!" to the end.

        Returns:
        The output of basic values.

      • getOutput

        public java.lang.String getOutput​()
        Returns the output of all values.

        Returns name, description, difficulty, hp, maxhp, strength, turnsWithInvincibilityLeft ny customVariables with inOutput set to true, and if the enemy is a finalBoss, then append " !FINALBOSS!" to the end.

        Returns:
        The output of all values

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName​()
        Returns the name.
        Returns:
        name

      • setName

        public void setName​(java.lang.String n)
        Sets the value of name to the value given.

        If the value given is null, then don't do anthing.

        Parameters:
        n - The new value.

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription​()
        Return the description.
        Returns:
        description

      • getMaxHp

        public int getMaxHp​()
        Returns the maxhp.
        Returns:
        maxhp

      • setMaxHp

        public void setMaxHp​(int a)
        Sets the value of maxhp to the value given.

        If the value given is less than 1, Then set it to 1. If hp is more than maxhp, then set the health to maxhp.

        Parameters:
        a - The new value.

      • getHp

        public int getHp​()
        Returns the hp.
        Returns:
        hp

      • damaged

        public void damaged​(int a,
                    java.lang.String customString)
        Decreases the value of hp by the value given assuming the enemy can be hurt this turn.

        If the new value given is less than 0, Then set it to 0. If greater than maxhp, then set it to the maxhp.

        Parameters:
        a - The amount damaged.
        customString - The custom string to be printed out with the default output.

      • heal

        public void heal​(int a)
        Increases the value of hp by the value given.

        If the new value given is less than 0, Then set it to 0. If greater than maxhp, then set it to the maxhp.

        Parameters:
        a - The amount healed.

      • getStrength

        public int getStrength​()
        Returns the strength.
        Returns:
        strength

      • setStrength

        public void setStrength​(int a)
        Sets the value of strength to the value given.

        If the value given is less than 0, then set it to 0.

        Parameters:
        a - The new value.

      • getDifficulty

        public int getDifficulty​()
        Calculates and returns the difficulty.
        Returns:
        difficulty

      • getTurnsWithInvincibilityLeft

        public int getTurnsWithInvincibilityLeft​()
        Returns the turnsWithInvincibilityLeft.
        Returns:
        turnsWithInvincibilityLeft

      • increaseTurnsWithInvincibilityLeft

        public void increaseTurnsWithInvincibilityLeft​(int a)
        Increases the value of hp by the value given.

        If the new value is less than 0, Then set it to 0.

        Parameters:
        a - The amount increased.

      • decreaseTurnsWithInvincibilityLeft

        public void decreaseTurnsWithInvincibilityLeft​(int a)
        Decreases the value of hp by the value given.

        If the new value is less than 0, Then set it to 0.

        Parameters:
        a - The amount decreased.

      • getLevelRequirement

        public int getLevelRequirement​()
        Returns the levelRequirement.
        Returns:
        levelRequirement

        Returns the possibleActions after calling filterPossibleActions().
        Returns:
        possibleActions

      • filterPossibleActions

        public void filterPossibleActions​()
        Loops through allActions and puts all that meet their requirements into possibleActions.

      • performRandomAction

        public void performRandomAction​(boolean includeAttack)
        Performs a random enemy action.
        Parameters:
        includeAttack - Whether or not the Random instance should consider the attack action (not given through packs).

      • getIsFinalBoss

        public boolean getIsFinalBoss​()
        Returns the finalBoss.
        Returns:
        finalBoss

      • invokePostmethods

        public void invokePostmethods​()
        Invokes all the possiblePostmethods.

        First calls filterPostmethods(), then invokes them.

      • filterPostmethods

        public void filterPostmethods​()
        Loops over all postmethods and adds all postmethods that meet their own requirements to possiblePostmethods.

        Adds valid postmethods to a new ArrayList that the possiblePostmethods is set to after.

      • invokePremethods

        public void invokePremethods​()
        Invokes all the possiblePremethods.

        First calls filterPremethods(), then invokes them.

      • filterPremethods

        public void filterPremethods​()
        Loops over all premethods and adds all premethods that meet their own requirements to allPremethods.

        Adds valid premethods to a new ArrayList that the possiblePremethods is set to after.

      • invokeRewardMethods

        public void invokeRewardMethods​()
        Invokes all the possibleRewardMethods.

        First calls filterRewardMethods(), then invokes them.

      • filterRewardMethods

        public void filterRewardMethods​()
        Loops over all rewardMethods and adds all that meet their own requirements to allRewardMethods.

        Adds valid rewardMethods to a new ArrayList that the possibleRewardMethods is set to after.

      • clone

        public java.lang.Object clone​()
                       throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        Clones this enemy.
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A clone of this enemy.
        Throws:
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException

      • attack

        public void attack​(int a,
                   java.lang.String customString)
        Attacks the player.

        Calls the damaged methods of the Player instance. If you want the enemy to attack with the strength, then use that as an argument.

        Parameters:
        a - The amount of damage to deal.
        customString - The string to be displayed with the default output.
